verses.name: Colossians 1:22
verses.text: In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:

verses.name: Colossians 1:23
verses.text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;

verses.name: Colossians 1:24
verses.text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body’s sake, which is the church:
